column2: "Thanks for coming. There's something occurring on the time axis that I wanted to talk to you about ."
"My analysis is on this area here."
"Can you hear me Xion? I think I have it pinned down."
"It seems there is a lot of movement. I didn't expect the appearance of a new type, the Dewmans though."
"I suppose it's the result of intervening with history."
"Well, it's not like I'm angry. I wouldn't want to pick a fight with you."
"Although I'm still unable to see your form."
"I'd like to be someone who understands you, but I suppose it's different from your perspective."
"I really don't want to make you angry, so I'll just excuse myself here."
"How did it go? Did she tell you anything?"
"I really need to thank you. Because of you I've been able to come gain some understanding of her."
"Why she does some things and not others; it's really interesting to watch."
"My name is Luther. If you need to know my title, it's something like \"lead researcher of space-time\"."
"Anyway, let's meet again."
"He can't see me, or hear my voice and yet he is aware of my existence."
"He is the reason I have entrusted everything to you."
"I do not want to trust fate to him."
"But the reason he became warped is because of my existence."
"I still regret the reasons for these origins. That is why I entrust everything to you."
"His name is Luther, leader of the Photoners."
"Or rather, he's the only Photoner."
"Everyone else wishes to be a Photoner, and so call themselves that."
"When [Elder]'s seal was broken, the Chrome Dragon was able to break free. There seems to be something going on here."
"But the reason could be that the first person to touch it was him..."
"I don't care about that! I only want to destroy the person who messed up our lives!"
"Quna, <%me> is the key. You understand that right?"
"I'll do things the way I decide. I have no intention of working with you, Casra of the Three Heroes."
"You realize it yourself, don't you?"
"Yes, you do Quna. If everything ended, this neck, this life I can do what ever you want with it."
"That's our contract. That's the only risk that you agreed to uphold."
"I really hate that face of yours. Just what are you after?"
"As of this point in time, the same as you."
"Hm."
"I'm going to lie low. Luther you..."

"ん？\u3000あれがルーサー？\u3000嘘でしょ？
ずいぶん趣味悪い格好してるけど
あれスーくんだよ。初代カスラ。"

"……いや、そういうことか。
乗っ取ったんだね、スーくんの身体を。
ルーサーならやっても不思議じゃない。"

"……イヤというほど知ってるよ
ルーサーのことは、さ。
わたしがこうなっちゃった原因だし。"

"四十年前の【巨躯】との戦争で
アークスは、そりゃあもうボロッボロに
なっちゃったんだよね。"

"みーんなやられちゃったから。
組織としての形が保てないぐらいに。"

"そこからアークスを立て直すには
ルーサーの技術が必要不可欠だった。
……それがどれだけ非人道的だとしても。"

"でも、ルーサーにアークスを好き勝手
いじられるのは、壊滅よりも怖い。
だから交換条件を出したんだ。"

"わたしが実験体となるかわりに
その研究結果でもって、アークスを
立て直すように、ってさ。"

"わたし、もとの身体はほんと病弱でさ。
どうせあのまま生きてても、そんなに
長くないって自分でわかってたから。"

"みんなのためになるなら、って提案して
ルーサーもそれを受け入れた。"

"結果、わたしのフォトン能力を礎とした
第二世代が生みだされて、アークスは
再び勢力を取り戻してくれた。"

"けど、そっか……
シオンの目的は、ルーサー絡みか。
やっぱそうなっちゃってるんだね。"

"死ぬ前まではしっかり監視できたけど
死んだ後は、どうしようもないから……
みんなに辛い思いさせちゃったかな。"

"……って、ヘコんでる場合じゃない。
こっから先が重要、だもんね。
しっかり見て、受け入れないと。"

"
Received Matterboard [Destination of the wrong path]
"
